Module RMA
Package RMA

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.DBConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBService
    class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    DBConnection encapsulates the underlying connectivity and query properties that make up the application's connection to the SQL Server database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.sql.Connection conn
      conn holds a reference to the Connection object that will be used in database calls.
      protected static java.sql.CallableStatement cStmt
      cStmt maintains a CallableStatement object reference to use when executing stored procedures.
      private static java.lang.String dbURL
      dbURL contains the URL connection String to connect to the database.
      protected static java.sql.PreparedStatement pStmt
      pStmt maintains a PreparedStatement object reference to use when executing insert, update, or delete statements.
      protected static java.sql.ResultSet rs
      rs maintains a ResultSet object reference to use in database queries.
      private static java.sql.Statement stmt
      stmt maintains a Statement object reference to use in database queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected DBConnection​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String instance)
      Constructor that takes in a username, password, and instance name, and attempts to create a connection to the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void closeConnection()
      closeConnection closes the database and statement connections.
      protected void connect()
      connect creates the database connection.
      protected void createCallableStatement​(java.lang.String sql)
      createCallableStatement prepares the cStmt field with the passed-in executable statement.
      protected void createPreparedStatement​(java.lang.String sql)
      createPreparedStatement prepares the pStmt field with the passed-in prepared SQL statement.
      protected void executePreparedStatementQuery()
      executePreparedStatementQuery executes the user-modified pStmt PreparedStatement and sets the local ResultSet rs variable with its results.
      protected void executeQuery​(java.lang.String sql)
      executeQuery loads the Statement instance with the passed-in SQL query and sets the local ResultSet rs variable with its results.
      protected boolean isConnected()
      isConnected checks that we have a connection to the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • dbURL

        private static java.lang.String dbURL
        dbURL contains the URL connection String to connect to the database.

      • conn

        private static java.sql.Connection conn
        conn holds a reference to the Connection object that will be used in database calls.

      • stmt

        private static java.sql.Statement stmt
        stmt maintains a Statement object reference to use in database queries.

      • cStmt

        protected static java.sql.CallableStatement cStmt
        cStmt maintains a CallableStatement object reference to use when executing stored procedures.

      • pStmt

        protected static java.sql.PreparedStatement pStmt
        pStmt maintains a PreparedStatement object reference to use when executing insert, update, or delete statements.

      • rs

        protected static java.sql.ResultSet rs
        rs maintains a ResultSet object reference to use in database queries.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBConnection

        protected DBConnection​(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String instance)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor that takes in a username, password, and instance name, and attempts to create a connection to the database.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username to use to connect to the database.
        password - The String password to use to connect to the database.
        instance - The String SQL Server instance name to connect.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        protected void connect()
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        connect creates the database connection.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

      • createCallableStatement

        protected void createCallableStatement​(java.lang.String sql)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        createCallableStatement prepares the cStmt field with the passed-in executable statement.
        Parameters:
        sql - The query to use to create the CallableStatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or there is an issue with the SQL query.

      • createPreparedStatement

        protected void createPreparedStatement​(java.lang.String sql)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        createPreparedStatement prepares the pStmt field with the passed-in prepared SQL statement.
        Parameters:
        sql - The query to use to create the PreparedStatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or there is an issue with the SQL query.

      • isConnected

        protected boolean isConnected()
        isConnected checks that we have a connection to the database.
        Returns:
        True if the connection exists, otherwise false.

      • executeQuery

        protected void executeQuery​(java.lang.String sql)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        executeQuery loads the Statement instance with the passed-in SQL query and sets the local ResultSet rs variable with its results.
        Parameters:
        sql - The String SQL query to parse.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or there is an issue with the SQL query.

      • executePreparedStatementQuery

        protected void executePreparedStatementQuery()
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        executePreparedStatementQuery executes the user-modified pStmt PreparedStatement and sets the local ResultSet rs variable with its results.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or there is an issue with the SQL query.

      • closeConnection

        protected void closeConnection()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        closeConnection closes the database and statement connections.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
